title: Textile
medium: Glass and gilt beads, silk and wool on canvas.
description: Pattern of repeated motif of curving flowers arranged to face alternately left and right.  Colors: several shades of blue, pink, green, brown, and gray.  Worked in beading, and tent and outline stitches.
name: Textile
